item.description: Go back to write-ups list This write-up is in French because it’s a French CTF, sowwy Category: Web Creator: Eteck Description: Your friend just had an idea: allow everyone to create the bike of their dream ! He asks you to verify if his website is secure, since you’re the best pentester he knows.
